isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - ADJUSTMENTS - CAB AIR SUSPENSION (9200/9300/9400 MODELS WITH PRO SLEEPER, AFTER MAY 1997)

svcproc.title: CAB AIR SUSPENSION (9200/9300/9400 MODELS WITH PRO SLEEPER, AFTER MAY 1997)
svcproc.para: The cab air suspension system for the 9200, 9300 and 9400 with Pro Sleeper is set at the factory and should not need adjustment. Cab air suspension ride height is fixed and should be 6-1/2 inches ± 1/16 (165 mm) between the bottom of the cab mounting bracket and the top of the crossmember mounting bracket ( Figure 85).
